doc:
Albert Arlen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albert_Arlen 0 Albert Arlen AM (10 January 1905 – 24 March 1993) was a Turkish Australian pianist, composer, actor and playwright. He is best known for his musical The Sentimental Bloke (to the poetry of C. J. Dennis), the "Alamein Concerto", and his setting of Banjo Paterson's Clancy of the Overflow. Albert_Arlen_AM ( 10_January_1905 – 24_March_1993 ) was a_Turkish_Australian_pianist , composer , actor_and_playwright .
